settings.title: I received the wrong item or am missing item(s) in my order.
settings.text: If you receive an incorrect order, we are so sorry for the mix up! Please immediately contact our support team and we'll get working on fixing our mistake!

settings.title: I received damaged or defective items.
settings.text: We do our best to get your order to you in perfect condition, but breakages can occasionally happen in transit. Please contact us immediately and/or follow the instructions included in the shipping box.

settings.title: My package says delivered, but I didn't receive it.
settings.text:
Sometimes USPS/UPS tracking information can be incorrect, and packages are marked as delivered before they actually arrive – oops! Your package will most likely be delivered within a few days, but it’s great to check with your neighbors and/or post office for more information in the meantime!

If you do not receive your order in the next 24 hours, please email our customer support team, within 3 days of the last tracking update, with your order number so that we may assist you further! :)

settings.title: What methods of payment do you take?
Do you ship to my country?
How much does shipping cost?
settings.text:
We provide Free Shipping on orders $99+ shipped to addresses in the US 48 states. Otherwise, we charge a flat rate of $5.95.

For international rates and more information view our shipping information page.

settings.title: How long does shipping take? When will I receive my order?
settings.text:
We process orders within 1-2 business days.

For customers in the U.S, transit time can add one to five days depending on your distance from Michigan.

Customers outside the U.S. should expect their package to arrive in 10-14 days. *Note: Covid-19 has increased international shipping delays. Actual transit time may be 14-28 days depending on country.

settings.title: Is there a way to track my order?
settings.text: After submitting an order, a confirmation email will be sent to you with the corresponding shipment tracking information.

settings.title: Can I return my purchase?
settings.text: If a product does not meet your expectations, simply return it to us within 60 days for a full refund minus any shipping charges you may have paid. Holiday purchases have a longer 90 day return window. Please see our Return Policy for all qualifying details.

settings.title: How do I ship directly to the gift recipient?
settings.text: Yes, simply enter the recipients details for the Shipping Address at checkout.

settings.title: Can I include a gift message with my order?
settings.text: Yes, there is an option to "Add a Note" at the bottom of the cart pop out. Your text will automatically save in the box.

settings.title: Is pricing details removed for gift orders?
settings.text: We will automatically remove pricing details for any order that includes a gift message.
